statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, order_id FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id > 50 AND order_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 200 ORDER BY preferences->'delivery_status' ASC
SELECT customer_name, order_id, preferences FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_details->'product' = 'shoes'
SELECT customer_name, order_id FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT order_id, order_details FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 2 AND preferences->>'shipping_method' = 'Express';
SELECT customer_name, preferences->>'email_notifications' AS email_notifications FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, order_details, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';

SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1='Option A' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_details FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status='Delivered' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY last_name;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT favorite_color, favorite_product FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders INNER JOIN CustomerInfo ON CustomerOrders.customer_id = CustomerInfo.customer_id
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductCatalog WHERE category = 'Electronics'

SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts;
